input.onclick: if(Keyword.length<4){alert('Your Keyword has to be atleast 4 characters long.\n\nPlease enter a valid Keyword.');};

div.style: background: transparent url(http://images.pcmac.org/Websites/ClatskanieSD6J/ClatskanieSD6J/images/SideNavCtnrRepeat.gif) repeat-y 0 35px; width: 192px; overflow:hidden; margin: 15px 0 0 0;

div.br:
471 SW Bel Air Drive
Clatskanie, OR 97016
Phone: (503) 728-0587

em.span: TO JOIN THE MONDAY, APRIL 13TH BOARD MEETING VIA ZOOM:

li.span: GO TO THE ZOOM WEBSITE, https://zoom.us/download#client_4meeting
CLICK ON THIS LINK, https://zoom.us/j/318372061?pwd=TXdXYXZyM3hTaXpmWWloUTlVQ2I2QT09 , TO JOIN THE MEETING.
THE BUDGET MEETING STARTS AT 6 PM AND THE REGULAR BOARD MEETING STARTS AT 6:30 PM.

span.br: BEGINNING APRIL 6TH, WE WILL BEGIN DELIVERY OF LUNCHES TO YOUR BUS STOP. EXPECT DELIVERIES BETWEEN 10 AM AND 12 NOON. IF YOU ARE PICKING UP MORE THAN ONE MEAL, PLEASE BRING SOMETHING TO CARRY MEALS IN. FOR YOUR PROTECTION AND THE PROTECTION OF OUR STAFF, PLEASE FOLLOW SOCIAL DISTANCING GUIDELINES. CES MATERIALS WILL BE DELIVERED ON MONDAY, APRIL 6TH. PLEASE BE PATIENT, THIS IS A NEW SYSTEM FOR US AND WE ARE DOING OUR BEST TO SERVE YOU.

h2.span: LOCATIONS FOR GRAB-N-GO LUNCHES BEGINNING APRIL 6TH. WE WILL ALSO PROVIDE THE NEXT DAY'S BREAKFAST IN THE GRAB-N-GO SACKS. STUDENT MEALS CAN BE PICKED UP BETWEEN 11:30 AM - 12:30 PM AT THE FOLLOWING SITES:

span.span: CLATSKANIE CITY PARK - NEAR THE GAZEBO
CLATSKANIE BAPTIST CHURCH ON NEHALEM STREET

div.h2: NASP Talking to Children About COVID-19 (Español)
SAMHSA Talking With Children during infectious disease outbreaks (Español)

span.span: Come and be a part of the budgeting process for the 20-21 school year. We have 2 - two year terms (expiring 6/30/21) and 2 - one year terms (expiring 6/30/20) available. The scheduled meetings are April 13, May 4 and, if necessary, May 13. Selected candidates must be registered voters of the district. Officers, agents or employees of the district are not eligible. To apply, click here, fill out the application and return it to the District Office via email to tburgher@csd.k12.or.us or drop it by our office located in CMHS by April 3rd at 3:30 pm. We look forward to receiving your application! If you have any questions, please contact Tami Burgher at the above email or call 503-728-0587 x2003.
